description:
Once Human is a New Weird open-world survival game developed by Starry Studio and published by NetEase. It was released for PC in 2023.

The game is set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by Aberrants, mutated monsters that have ravaged humanity. Players must explore the world, gather resources, and build weapons and tools in order to survive.

Once Human features a variety of gameplay elements, including:

  • Survival: Players must gather food, water, and shelter in order to survive. They must also manage their health, stamina, and temperature.
  • Exploration: Players can explore a vast open world filled with ruins, abandoned cities, and dangerous creatures.
  • Crafting: Players can craft a variety of weapons, tools, and structures.
  • Combat: Players can fight Aberrants using a variety of weapons and melee attacks.
  • Building: Players can build their own bases and fortifications.

Once Human is a challenging game, but it is also very rewarding. The game's world is beautiful and immersive, and the gameplay is deep and engaging. If you're a fan of survival games, I highly recommend Once Human.

How to Play Once Human

To play Once Human, you must first choose a server and create a character. You can choose from a variety of different character classes, each with its own unique abilities.

Once you have created a character, you will be placed in the game world. You will need to gather resources and build weapons and tools in order to survive. You will also need to explore the world and fight Aberrants.

As you progress through the game, you will unlock new technologies and abilities. You will also be able to build larger and more complex structures.

The goal of the game is to survive and thrive in the post-apocalyptic world. You can do this by exploring the world, gathering resources, crafting weapons and tools, fighting Aberrants, and building bases and fortifications.

Tips for Playing Once Human

Here are some tips for playing Once Human:

  • Explore the world. The world of Once Human is vast and beautiful. Take your time and explore every corner of it. You will find many useful resources and hidden secrets.
  • Gather resources. Resources are essential for survival. Gather food, water, and wood whenever you can. You will also need to gather resources to craft weapons, tools, and structures.
  • Craft weapons and tools. Weapons and tools are essential for survival and combat. Craft a variety of different weapons and tools to suit your needs.
  • Fight Aberrants. Aberrants are dangerous creatures that will attack you on sight. Be prepared to fight them whenever you encounter them.
  • Build bases and fortifications. Bases and fortifications can provide you with shelter and protection from Aberrants. Build a base as soon as possible and upgrade it as you progress through the game.
